channel.title: Gill, Andy on Chege's Blog

item.title: AoC 2021 Day 08: Seven Segment Search
item.description: Day 8 - Advent of Code 2021. Eric Wastl. adventofcode.com . Accessed Mar 7, 2022. Part I Description You barely reach the safety of the cave when the whale smashes into the cave mouth, collapsing it. Sensors indicate another exit to this cave at a much greater depth, so you have no choice but to press on. As your submarine slowly makes its way through the cave system, you notice that the four-digit seven-segment displays in your submarine are malfunctioning; they must have been damaged during the escape.

item.title: AoC 2021 Day 09: Smoke Basin
item.description: Multi-dimensional arrays using massiv; Fusion; Box vs. Unboxed; Connected Components; Data.Set; Monadic map
